overview:
Real Estate investor and entrepreneur.

Daniel Mulroy began investing in real estate since 2006, and retired from a Property Management career in June, 2009. He has since focused on his new online-based real estate marketing media interest, Condorenderings.com, which was officially launched in Fall, 2009. As of February, 2010, Condorenderings.com has a presence in 5 countries world-wide.

Daniel Mulroy has a business degree from the Asper School of Business, double-majoring in Entrepreneurship and International Management.

Daniel Mulroy lived and worked in Beijing, China, and speaks/reads advanced Mandarin Chinese.

Daniel has joined Invenia Technical Computing Corporation as Business Development Manager, Asia.

As of July, 2010, Mulroy is in either Shanghai, PR. China or Beijing, PR.China establishing local partnerships with Invenia.

firm.name: DRM Strata Management, Marketing, and Development

milestones.description: Featured, 4-page interview in Canadian Real Estate Magazine entitled "Self-Taught Investor"
milestones.source_description: Self-Taught Investor, Canadian Real Estate Magazine

milestones.description: Establishes Beijing's first Entrepreneurship program in affiliation with TopU College (private)
